description: This file is a Python script demonstrating how to use the OpenWeatherTools class to fetch weather data from the OpenWeatherMap API, including creating an agent, configuring it with the tool, and making sample requests.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can utilize tools to perform tasks.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class to output responses based on prompts.
